name: Yokai Detective Kou
description:
When Kou, a Yokai "Detective" summons Sada, a ghost from the tv, he has to team up with her to spread her legend or else he'll lose his soul.

This was the first visual novel and Spooktober jam for a lot of us in the team so we hope you like it!

FEATURES & WARNINGS

  • ~20k words & ~1.5 to 2 hour playtime
  • Partial Voice Acting
  • Content Warnings: Very light mention of bullying, One heavily telegraphed "Jumpscare"
